person_say: I didn't do well on my exam, and it's making me feel really discouraged. How can I regain my confidence?
animal_say: There's a wise bear named Bruno who specializes in mindfulness and can help you manage that discouragement! Would you like to meet him to boost your confidence?

person_say: Yes, meeting Bruno sounds wonderful! I would love to get some tips from him to boost my confidence.
animal_say: Great choice! Here comes Bruno, the mindfulness master! He'll help you regain your confidence and find your inner strength!
